procedure.title: REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS TO FORM A CONSULTANCY PANEL TO TO SUPPORT THE FURTHR INNOVATION EXCHANGE BY WAY OF A DYNAMIC PURCHASING SYSTEM (DPS)
procedure.description:
**Title:** REQUEST FOR PROPOSALS TO FORM A CONSULTANCY PANEL TO SUPPORT THE FURTHR INNOVATION EXCHANGE BY WAY OF A DYNAMIC PURCHASING SYSTEM (DPS)

**Description:**
Furthr, a Dublin-based business innovation centre, is defining this Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) to establish an ongoing mechanism to enable new suppliers that meet the threshold to be added to the training panels that Furthr may wish to put in place over time. The DPS is an electronic system which suppliers can join at any time. This Dynamic Purchasing System will operate by way of mini-competition draw down and will be in place for four years. Tenderers can join or leave the DPS at any stage during this period in line with provisions for DPS in the procurement directives. The DPS framework will be used to govern each standalone drawdown. The desired programmes are outlined in Appendix 1.

**Key Requirements:**
- **Supplier Profile:** The ideal bidder should have experience in business and management consultancy services, including coaching, marketing management, financial management, and business development consultancy.
- **Technical Expertise:** Bidders should possess strong technical expertise in areas such as training programme services, training seminars, and specialist training services.
- **Flexibility:** The ability to participate in mini-competition draw downs and adapt to changing requirements is essential.
- **Compliance:** Bidders must comply with the terms of the procurement, including electronic invoicing and payment.
- **Organizational Fit:** The bidder should be able to integrate seamlessly with Furthr's innovation exchange initiatives, supporting the development of strategic company development programs for the creative industries.

**Additional Information:**
- **Contact Details:** For more information, please contact Furthr at grainnetallon@furthr.ie or 01 671 3111.
- **Procurement Documents:** The procurement documents are available on the eTenders platform at https://www.etenders.gov.ie/epps/cft/listContractDocuments.do?resourceId=3117247.
- **Submission Guidelines:** Tenders must be submitted electronically through the eTenders platform by the specified deadline.

lots.title: Acquisition Services
lots.description: Furthr is defining this DPS to establish an ongoing mechanism to enable new suppliers that meet the threshold to be added to the training panels that Furthr may wish to put in place over time. Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) is unlike a traditional framework for the supply of goods, works or services. A DPS is an electronic system which suppliers can join at any time. This Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) will operate by way of mini-competition draw down and will be in place for four years. Tenderers can join or leave the DPS at any stage during this period in line with provisions for DPS in the procurement directives. Appendix 1 contains the breakdown of the desired programmes. The DPS framework will be used to govern each standalone drawdown.
